name: Linqee
description:
Play while exercising your concentration with LINQEE!

The aim of the game is simple: join the dots of the same colour all the while filling in all the boxes of the game level, without going back over those already filled in!

LINQEE IS:
- A simple and accessible concept, with progressive difficulty to give the most experienced players a real challenge!
- More than 2,300 different levels!
- The option to play anywhere, at any time!
- An effective means of training your brain and your concentration!
- Rewards every day!

NOTES
-LINQEE contains advertisements and in-app purchases.
